card.bio: first-year computer science student at Universitas Sumatera Utara. junior frontend developer

me.title: Me
me.subtitle: Axel Ramadhan
me.description: First-year computer science student, self-taught programmer, and junior frontend developer. I build websites with Vue and/or Nuxt. Also codes with MCR playing in the background.

philosophy.title: Philosophy
philosophy.subtitle: Sharp & clear
philosophy.description: Contrasting colours, readable fonts, minimal elements so that you may focus on the screen. Rounded edges? Not today, thank you. Sharp, clear, and self-explanatory features for the win. I love Vue and Nuxt.
philosophy.reason: I believe in component reusability. Smaller, focused workspaces make debugging far more efficient than monolithic structures.

style.subtitle: Reference
